basic_info.description: I'm Reza Bigdeli. I have recently graduated from the University of Waterloo with a Master's degree in Computer Science. Before that, I got my Bachelor's degree from Sharif University of Technology in Software Engineering in 2020. I am mostly interested in 1) research on topics related to Algorithms and Combinatorial Optimization 2) web application development. I have gained experience in both areas through my studies and internships. As a researcher, I have done research in areas like Computational Geometry, Graph Theory, and Approximation Algorithms. In internships and web development projects, I have worked with technologies like Django, Django Rest Framework, React, Redux, Angular, and Postgresql. Currently, I am looking for a Sofware Engineering job - preferably as a full-stack developer - in Canada.

projects.title: Kapo Online Shop
projects.description: This was a complete experience of creating a web application. Working in a small group using Scrum methodology, we went through many stages of product development: project planning, sprint planning, project management (using Taiga), implementation (using web technologies like Django Rest Framework, React, and Redux), testing, and deploying. I worked as a full-stack developer in this project.

projects.title: Kapo Currency Exchange System
projects.description: This was my first complete web development project - developed for the "System Design" course. We produced a proposal, Work Breakdown Structure (WBS), and User Case Diagram, and implemented the application. During this project, I worked with Django and HTML as a back-end developer.

projects.title: Children of Time
projects.description: The first and only game I have developed until now. It was for the "Advanced programming" course using Java programming language. It is an RPG based on the famous game "Children of Time".
